casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as Trustee FOR MASTR ASSET BACKED SECURITIES TRUST 2005-OPT1, MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2005-OPT1, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Todd MARRAZZO, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
Mrs. Marrazzo, Unknown Spouse of Todd Marrazzo, et al., Defendants. C-1037 September Term 2017
081221 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000998-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
